contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 21, 1971 D NWABBA Contest (Third Section)
NWABBA Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest nwabba-contest-third-section
Snowdon Fantasy
Pembroke Halls, Worsley, Lancashire Choice of Snowdon Fantasy or Crown Cavalcade. Prizes - 1st £30 and rose bowl, 2nd £20 and trophy, 3rd £15 and shield, 4th £5 and cup. Best cornet - Moston and Beswick. Best horn - Farnworth Old. Best trombone - Thornsett. Best euphonium - Flimby Saxhorn. 11 bands competed.
April 19, 2013, 8:14 a.m. June 18, 2016, 11:04 a.m.
1 Greenalls Band Charles Fradley
2 North Ashton Prize Leslie Naylor
3 Dobcross Silver Band George R. Gibson
4 Farnworth Old Wright Hurst
5 Moston & Beswick Band Albert Risby
Unknown Result Colne Borough Harold Smith
Unknown Result Flimby Saxhorn R. Martin
Unknown Result Thornsett Brian Taylor
Unknown Result Blackburn and Darwen Band D. Crossley
Unknown Result Radcliffe Brass Band C. A. Randall
Unknown Result Bury Public Silver Band Hugh Parry
